WRITING.TEXT:
Three months after the abrupt end of "Top Gear" on BBC2, reports indicate that the show's trio of hosts are headed for Netflix. [Report] (http://uk.businessinsider.com/report-top-gear-trio-headed-to-netflix-2015-6?r=US#ixzz3caWQY3Vd)
So yes, its speculative.
